title: How to get unlimited data forever - Quora

response.answer_text: First you need to realize that ‘forever’ is a really long time. And then you need to realize that your money — cold hard cash — has power in the marketplace! Your possible routes to Unlimited Data Forever include these (and there may be more!): Establish and fund a trust fund that will pay for unlimited date into the indefinite future. Pay your annual bills out of that fundContract with a current provider for unlimited data forever, with the contract ensuring a transition plan in case the entity is bought, or liquidated damages in case it goes out of business

Unlimited doesn’t mean free, however, there are generally many contracts, such as business links that are will allow businesses to fully use their bandwidth with little to no traffic management. Also, the sun will expand and swallow the Earth at some point, so it won’t be forever either.
